column1: Tim the cat sat on the big red mat. He saw a fat rat run by. Tim ran after the rat but it was too fast. Tim came back to the mat and took a nap.
column2: Sara loves to play in the park. She swings high on the swing and slides down the slide. The sun is shining bright, and the birds are chirping in the trees.
column3: In a small town by the sea, there was a little bakery. The baker, Mrs. Thompson, made the most delicious cakes and cookies. People from all around would come to taste her treats.
column4: Every morning,the aroma of freshly baked bread would waft through the streets inviting everyone in for a warm,tasty breakfast.
column5: Deep in the heart of the jungle, there lived a curious monkey named Momo. Momo loved exploring the dense forests and discovering new things. One day, while swinging from tree to tree, Momo found a hidden waterfall. The water sparkled like diamonds in the sunlight, and colorful butterflies danced around the area.
